reviewText: This is the very first upload on my (very gay) youtube gaming channel. More episodes will be coming in... Check out part 1 here :https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1Kf8uKM13zI\n\nVery fun game with lots of great, addicting mechanics. A+

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IiooJpiqAbY

**QUICK THOUGHTS**
While I can't say that the game is all that bad, it definitely isn't a lot of fun. Truthfully, I enjoyed the sports" angle of using the skateboard to grind along certain pipes and obstacles
date: and greatly appreciate the hand drawn artwork. The whole thing reminded me of Comedy Central's series 'Ugly Americans' with backgrounds taken from one of the adult coloring books that are all the rage right now (and I own one of).\n\nWhat really killed it for me were the combat mechanics. Attacking on foot is absolutely useless so that leaves you only with the jump attack on your board
recommended: and it gets repetitive insanely quick. Even when you unlock additional attacks
hoursPlayed: which require you to grab some mr. yuck sticker pick-ups to use properly
voteText: their power even seems stinted and not as useful as you would hope until much later in the game.\n\nI'd also like to see the camera fixed to show more of the direction you're moving in
helpfulPercent: as I felt I had to stop sometimes and gauge certain obstacles instead of being able to flow smoothly from one to the next as I'm not entirely sure where I'm going. Maybe that's just me
votesHelpful: but it'd be nice is all I'm saying.\n\nAll in all
votesTotal: I put about forty minutes in the game
votesFunny: and I have very little interest in revisiting it. Can't really recommend this title based on that
commentsCount: but if the developer works on it a little more and adds a secondary standard attack

reviewText: ძალიან საინტერესო თამაშია, ორიგინალური სათამაშო პროცესსით, ასევე თამაშს აქვს საკმაოდ ლამაზი გრაფიკა. გირჩევთ შეძენისათვის!
